question: 犠飛
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>sacrifice</kanji> <kanji>fly</kanji> is a <vocabulary>sacrifice fly</vocabulary>. In baseball, this is when you hit the ball in the air so the runner can tag up and move up a base.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the on'yomi readings. For <ja>飛</ja> just think about how <reading>he</reading> (<ja>ひ</ja>) hit a sacrifice fly, and he hit it so hard the ball <reading>he</reading>ated up.
